data.title: Unbreakable Early Mid Information ZERO/POINT
data.description: Here's an easy, yet powerful way to gain information early into the round towards mid.

data.title: B Main Info Knife From Site
data.description: Here's a simple, yet effective way to get early information towards B Main.

data.title: Start Round Unbreakable A Main Info ZERO/POINT
data.description: Either at the start of the round, or early into it, throw this knife for easy information towards the A side of the map.
